detailsData.title: Experienced Founder
detailsData.content: Jay Knispel, with over two decades of legal experience, has dedicated his career to helping accident victims in New York City, leveraging his background to fight against insurance companies and corporations.

detailsData.title: Impressive Results
detailsData.content: The firm boasts a track record of litigating multi-million dollar cases in areas of automobile liability, workplace accidents, and premises liability, demonstrating their capability to secure significant verdicts and settlements.

detailsData.title: Comprehensive Practice
detailsData.content: Offering a wide range of personal injury legal services, from car accidents to wrongful death cases, the firm is equipped to handle various types of personal injury claims, ensuring clients receive specialized representation.

detailsData.title: Client-Centric Approach
detailsData.content: With a focus on compassion and understanding, the firm prioritizes the needs and best interests of their clients, offering personalized attention and a commitment to achieving the best possible outcomes.

address: 450 Seventh Ave., Suite 1605 New York, New York 10123
companyName: Law Offices of Jay S. Knispel
subHeading: New York’s personal injury law firm
valueProp: Jay Knispel is a New York City personal injury lawyer and founding partner of the Law Offices of Jay S. Knispel, LLC. Born and raised in Brooklyn, NY, Mr. Knispel appreciates the impact an unexpected and avoidable accident can have on victims and their family members. His legal career, which spans more than two decades, has been dedicated to helping his neighbors and community stand up to insurance companies, deep-pocketed corporations, and other adversaries after tragic accidents. He helps New York City accident victims stand tall and demand compensation they rightfully deserve under personal injury law.

testimonalData.text: I highly recommend The Law Offices of Jay S. Knispel. They were so diligent and professional with my case. I was so confident when they would meet with me during depositions and other processes. They kept me well informed and updated throughout my case. They fought so hard to get me the compensation that I deserved. Thank you so much.
testimonalData.author: Bernadette Cruz

testimonalData.text: Jay worked his tail off and was able to get my mom a great outcome for her fall that broke her legs. He was always there when needed. It is evident that Jay puts in the work knows the ins and outs of the court system in NYC. His knowledge of the way defense attorneys work separates him from the rest. I highly recommend Jay without reservation.
testimonalData.author: Richard Repaci

testimonalData.text: Throughout my entire case, Jay was always incredibly responsive and spent time walking me through each step. He is incredibly professional and yet down to earth making the stressful process a bit more calming. Jay always knew exactly which turn to take when it came to my case and yet was respectful of any decisions I wanted to make. I highly recommend him and his office.
testimonalData.author: Cortnie Yeoman-Vargas
